sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f1cb7ec813da041032813092e144b06a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Assets</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var fileName = request.pathParams.file;
    var currentRecord = "f1cb7ec813da041032813092e144b06a";
    var ar = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    ar.addQuery('table_sys_id', currentRecord);
    ar.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
    ar.query();

	response.setContentType('application/octet-stream');
    response.setStatus(200);

    if (ar.next()) {
		var gsa = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var attachmentStream = new gsa.getContentStream(ar.sys_id.toString());
		var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
		writer.writeStream(attachmentStream);
    } else {
        return "file not found";
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_744337_vue_app/container/other_assets/{file}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/other_assets/{file}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>robert.mccardell</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-07 21:00:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>f1cb7ec813da041032813092e144b06a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assets</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Vue App" source="x_744337_vue_app">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Vue App">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f1cb7ec813da041032813092e144b06a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>robert.mccardell</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-07 21:13:37</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Vue App Container">74daba8813da041032813092e144b0e1</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_app"><sys_app action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><can_edit_in_studio>false</can_edit_in_studio><enforce_license>log</enforce_license><guided_setup_guid/><js_level>helsinki_es5</js_level><licensable>true</licensable><license_category>none</license_category><license_model>none</license_model><logo/><menu/><name>Vue App</name><private>false</private><restrict_table_access>false</restrict_table_access><runtime_access_tracking>permissive</runtime_access_tracking><scope>x_744337_vue_app</scope><scoped_administration>false</scoped_administration><short_description>Application container to serve Vue bundle files</short_description><source>x_744337_vue_app</source><store_correlation_id/><store_url/><sys_class_name>sys_app</sys_class_name><sys_code/><sys_created_by>robert.mccardell</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-07 20:55:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>robert.mccardell</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-07 21:20:22</sys_updated_on><template/><trackable>true</trackable><user_role/><vendor/><vendor_prefix/><version>1.0.0</version></sys_app></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_b7fa32c813da041032813092e144b0f5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>JS</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var fileName = request.pathParams.file;
    var currentRecord = "b7fa32c813da041032813092e144b0f5";
    var ar = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    ar.addQuery('table_sys_id', currentRecord);
    ar.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
    ar.query();
    if (ar.next()) {
        var message = new GlideSysAttachment().getContent(ar);
        if (fileName.indexOf('-js')>0) response.setContentType('text/javascript');
		 else response.setContentType('text/css');
        response.setStatus(200);
        response.getStreamWriter().writeString(message);
    } else {
        return "file not found";
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_744337_vue_app/container/js/{file}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/js/{file}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>robert.mccardell</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-07 20:57:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>b7fa32c813da041032813092e144b0f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JS</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Vue App" source="x_744337_vue_app">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Vue App">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_b7fa32c813da041032813092e144b0f5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>robert.mccardell</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-07 21:13:19</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Vue App Container">74daba8813da041032813092e144b0e1</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ac5b3ac813da041032813092e144b01c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>IMG</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var fileName = request.pathParams.file;
    var currentRecord = "ac5b3ac813da041032813092e144b01c";
    var ar = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    ar.addQuery('table_sys_id', currentRecord);
    ar.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
    ar.query();

	response.setContentType('image/jpeg');
    response.setStatus(200);

    if (ar.next()) {
		var gsa = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var attachmentStream = new gsa.getContentStream(ar.sys_id.toString());
		var writer = response.getStreamWriter();
		writer.writeStream(attachmentStream);
    } else {
        return "file not found";
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_744337_vue_app/container/img/{file}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/img/{file}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>robert.mccardell</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-07 20:58:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>ac5b3ac813da041032813092e144b01c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>IMG</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Vue App" source="x_744337_vue_app">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Vue App">f2ba728813da041032813092e144b01f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ac5b3ac813da041032813092e144b01c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>robert.mccardell</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-07 21:14:02</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Vue App Container">74daba8813da041032813092e144b0e1</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
